body:
So I don't really keep up with things anymore so if the answer is simple, forgive me.

Now that Owners and Admins have their own ranks, how does Kyoal and Tyler stand out from Distraction, Passively and Micah?
What do the Admins do that the Senior Mods don't? Considering the Owners run this server, what do Admins do now?

Maybe it's just because I'm not really here anymore, but I look at the 2 Admins as glorified Sr Mods.
Publicly, the Admins don't seem to do much.. Passively and Distracion have a bigger presence on the forums than the 2 Admins for example.

Not trying to start shit or anything, I'm just curious I guess.
body_tagged:

Maybe it's just because I'm not really here anymore, but I look at the 2 Admins as glorified Sr Mods.
Publicly, the Admins don't seem to do much.. Passively and Distracion have a bigger presence on the forums than the 2 Admins for example.

Not trying to start shit or anything, I'm just curious I guess.
title: Admins and Sr Mods

replies.body:
Good question tbh. I've been wondering what the Srs have been doing for a bit now...

Permission wise they obviously have more access. I think the "staff response" would be that Owners run the backend of the server, like Keenan running the business end & ALM focusing on the development (though ALM obviously plays a bigger part in just development). Therefore the Admins would be left with running the staff team, and they probably have a say in the server direction as well.

But seriously, I have no idea what the Admins do these days that is different than that of a Sr. I'm not even sure what the Sr team does.

Therefore the Admins would be left with running the staff team, and they probably have a say in the server direction as well.

But seriously, I have no idea what the Admins do these days that is different than that of a Sr. I'm not even sure what the Sr team does.

replies.body:
Forums wise the Sr Team posts are either Map Development related or application related..
There doesn't seem to be any real direction which is a shame.

the big secret of the avicus staff conspiracy is that seniors/admins don't do anything
frankly at this point i don't even think tylerdotmichael is a real person
